  • Method Details

    • validateCourse

      public static boolean validateCourse(Course course) throws InvalidCourseException
      Validates a Course object for various attributes including name, cover image URL, language, prices, timing, instructor name, company details, and top skills. (Create Course Validation)
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the course is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCourseException - If the course is found to be invalid.

    • validateUpdatedCourse

      public static boolean validateUpdatedCourse(Course course) throws InvalidCourseException
      Validates a Course object for various attributes, intended for course updates. (Update Course Validation)
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the updated course is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCourseException - If the updated course is found to be invalid.

    • validateName

      public static boolean validateName(String name) throws InvalidCourseException
      Validates a course name based on specific pattern criteria.
      Parameters:
      name - The course name to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the course name is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCourseException - If the course name is found to be invalid.

      public static boolean validateURL(String url) throws InvalidCourseException

    • validatePriceDifference

      public static boolean validatePriceDifference(int markedPrice, int sellingPrice)
      Validates the price difference between marked price and selling price.
      Parameters:
      markedPrice - The marked price of the course.
      sellingPrice - The selling price of the course.
      Returns:
      true if the price difference is valid, false otherwise.
